level.text: Be provided in fifteen (15) minute units;
Consist of a face-to face encounter; and
Meet all other requirements set forth in 22 DCMR ยง 3423.
Assertive community treatment shall not be billed on the same day as any other MHRS, except for crisis/emergency which requires retrospective authorization by DMH.
Assertive community treatment shall be provided in a DMH-certified community mental health rehabilitation services agency, the client’s home or other community setting.
